topic.title: EMS Cardiac Arrest Event Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11394 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.14"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS Cardiac Arrest Event Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10134)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Cardiac Arrest Event" which SHOULD equal "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event" (CONF:10937)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10939)
Conforms to Cardiac Arrest (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.27)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS Cardiac Arrest Event Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10134)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Cardiac Arrest Event" which SHOULD equal "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event" (CONF:10937)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10939)
Conforms to Cardiac Arrest (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.27)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.14"/> <code code="67799-7" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="EMS Cardiac Arrest Event Narrative NEMSIS"/> <title>EMS Cardiac Arrest Event</title> <text/> </section>
